snippet.title: How To Gain Speed On PumpTracks & Trails  - How To Pump A Bike
snippet.description:
Pumping is such a fun & useful skill to learn for mountain biking and bmx. In this video we go over the theory of pumping and explain how to get more speed on rollers and bumps by using your body weight to accelerate. 

▶ If you really like what we are doing and want to support us we have a few different ways you can help out below 😊

#1  We have some links to our favorite products listed below. Using our link doesn't cost you any money at all but it really helps us out with a small commission of around 5% :)

#2 Join Our Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/RideMtb 
Our Patreon is a place where we like to communicate with our crew one on one, brainstorm new video ideas, and do monthly hang outs! Being a Patron can also unlock some exclusive discounts so you could save money and support us at the same time!

#3 - Get to Amazon Via This Link - https://www.amazon.com/shop/ridemtb
It doesn't cost you anything extra next time you shop and Amazon will give us a small commission for directing you there! 

Thank you guys for everything! We are so glad to have you as part of our crew!

Kyle & April
https://www.ridemtb.com/

▶ All of our Pov, Video, and Audio Equipment - https://www.ridemtb.com/gear

▶ Most Common Equipment Questions We Get:
Bikes we use - https://jenson.sjv.io/Vy42rO
Kneepads we use - https://jenson.sjv.io/qngmZO
Helmets we use - https://jenson.sjv.io/6bGnd3
Kyle’s riding gear - https://jenson.sjv.io/yRrjjy
April’s riding gear - https://jenson.sjv.io/vn2QQN
Kyle's clipless shoes - https://jenson.sjv.io/BXKOy4
April’s flat pedal shoes - https://jenson.sjv.io/n1nPWR
Our favorite chain lube - https://jenson.sjv.io/BXKRWy
Kyle’s signature handlebar - https://bit.ly/2SdbllD
Seat dropper post - https://jenson.sjv.io/P0am3e
Kyle’s clipless pedals -  https://jenson.sjv.io/Xx1GnM
April’s flat pedals - https://jenson.sjv.io/n1nPoa
Tubeless sealant - https://jenson.sjv.io/e4RegZ
Wheelsets - https://jenson.sjv.io/jW1QZa
Brakes/Derailleur - https://jenson.sjv.io/gboqg0
Favorite riding pack - https://jenson.sjv.io/5bj162
Foundation bike stand - https://jenson.sjv.io/3P7yyA
Feedback bike stand - https://jenson.sjv.io/2rKyMG


▶ Huge thanks to our channel partners for helping us keep these videos ad free during the middle of the video! 

Jenson USA -  https://jenson.sjv.io/P0aaRQ
Niner Bikes - https://bit.ly/2T9yqWm
Project Filter, Idaho fights Tobacco - https://bit.ly/3gq4hdv
SR Suntour - Suspension - https://bit.ly/3w84b0L
Stan’s No Tubes - Wheels and Sealant - https://bit.ly/3x33JRg
Schwalbe Tires - https://bit.ly/3itSzRJ
PNW Components- Handlebar, Stem, Grips, Dropper Post - https://bit.ly/3fC8pVU
Ergon - Saddles - https://bit.ly/2SnpsEL
Apparel and Protection - https://bit.ly/34IqcqM https://bit.ly/355BaH2
Ride Concepts - Shoes - https://bit.ly/3gBuJRx
Shimano - Brakes and Drivetrain - https://bit.ly/3pfvPGa
Onnit - Supplements and Snacks - https://bit.ly/3x6E1vi
